name: LioDen, Simple Blues
description: The Simple Colors, Blue layout from my Free CSS thread on LioDen, now for the whole site! Images for background and main lion BG in den were made in Krita by myself.
additional_info: I highly recommend disabling user CSS/HTML in Den Descriptions. There's an option to turn them off, and I suggest doing so if you're to use this or any style for LioDen's whole site. Other CSS in dens will conflict with this otherwise. Change Log 11/11/2017 Made some fixes and changes. Cleaned things up a bit too.
